org.jetel.graph

Class EdgeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.EdgeFactory

  • public class EdgeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory class is intended to be used for factorisation of graph edges. For now only two types of edges are distinguished - regular and jobflow edges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EdgeFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id, DataRecordMetadata metadata)

      Returns appropriate edge implementation for given parameters.
      static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id, DataRecordMetadataStub metadataStub)
      Returns appropriate edge implementation for given parameters.
      static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id, Edge templateEdge)
      Creates new edge (see newEdge(String, DataRecordMetadata)) derived from the given edge, with same setting (metadata, debug mode, ...).

    • Method Detail

      • newEdge

        public static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id,
           DataRecordMetadata metadata,
           boolean debugMode)
        Returns appropriate edge implementation for given parameters. Either regular Edge or JobflowEdge is returned based on ContextProvider#getJobType().

      • newEdge

        public static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id,
           DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Returns appropriate edge implementation for given parameters. Either regular Edge or JobflowEdge is returned based on ContextProvider#getJobType().

      • newEdge

        public static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id,
           Edge templateEdge)
        Creates new edge (see newEdge(String, DataRecordMetadata)) derived from the given edge, with same setting (metadata, debug mode, ...).

      • newEdge

        public static Edge newEdge(java.lang.String id,
           DataRecordMetadataStub metadataStub)
        Returns appropriate edge implementation for given parameters. Either regular Edge or JobflowEdge is returned based on ContextProvider#getJobType().
